|castingnoise=4 |spellnoise=0 }} '''Forescry''' was a a [[Divinations]] spell which increased the player's [[EV]] by 8. The flavour of the spell was that by allowing the character to see slightly into the future, he or she could more deftly dodge blows. ==History== When the Divinations school was removed in [[0.6]], this spell was removed as well, and the [[Translocations]] spell [[Phase Shift]] introduced to replace it with exactly the same effect, albeit with a different flavour.
